attributes.action: GUARANTEE ALL MIGRANTS IN THE UK THE RIGHT TO STAY!
attributes.additional_details:
Why is this important?

Migrants, refugees and asylum seekers currently living in the UK are our families, our friends, our co-workers, our community, and our culture. Britain's exit from the EU has made all of their futures uncertain. They have the right to be here and to stay here.
